page.title: 12CONTRAPLAN & OTHER FIRMS.
page.content: On Paynes Lane and Somers Road there are industrial estates consisting of 91 small firms. { { CONTRAPLAN CONTRAPLAN INTERNATIONAL LTD.,is the largest firm on the Somers Road Industrial Estate.Contraplan International started in 1966.It has 1 branch in the U.K., which employs 81 people.Office furniture is made,using chipboard and other timber,cloth foam and steel.These materials come from the U.K. and Europe.Contraplan's products are sent all over the U.K. and the world,being transported in their own fleet of lorries.{ {SERVICES OFFERED BY OTHER FIRMS. These firms offer a wide range of services including the following:- making,storing,selling,repairing,fitt- ing,servicing,hiring,delivering,teachi ng,generating,checking,surveying,
